## Variables

`speaker`

:   Speaker's ID.

`gender`

:   Speaker's gender.

`labels`

:   SAMPA label.

`word`

:   Word with the target vowel.

`bundle`

:   Recording file ID.

`F1`

:   First formant value (Hz).

`F2`

:   Second formant value (Hz).

`F3`

:   Third formant value (Hz).

`start`

:   Onset of vowel (ms within recording).

`end`

:   Offset of vowel (ms within recording).

`sample_start`

:   Sample ID of onset of vowel (within recording).

`sample_end`

:   Sample ID of offset vowel (within recording).

`times_orig`

: [Unknown.]

`vowel`

: IPA vowel.

`F1.z`

:   First formant value (z-score).

`F2.z`

:   Second formant value (z-score).

`F1.z.hz`

:   First formant value (normalised Hz).

`F2.z.hz`

:   Second formant value (normalised Hz).

`F1.z.bark`

:   First formant value (normalised Bark).

`F2.z.bark`

:   Second formant value (normalised Bark).

`F2_F1.z.hz`

:   F2-F1 difference (normalised Hz).
